paragraph1: Gene Sigalov co-founded SimpleTexting, a business SMS platform that grew to 17,000+ customers including Starbucks, DHL, and FedEx. He scaled the company to $20M ARR as CEO before its acquisition by Sinch in 2021.
paragraph2: Now he's building Upfirst.ai, an AI-powered answering service that helps small businesses never miss a call. With a background in computer science and law (B.S., J.D.), he's focused on creating technology that solves real problems for business owners.
